basic.commands: (`cmds`) Automatically generated list of all public commands

fun.billzo: Know all the different editions of billzo.
fun.google_translate: (`gt`) Translate a phrase through several languages.

games.hangman: (`hoang`) Play hangman with %lowername% because %lowername% is very lonely.
games.minesweeper: (`mines`) PLay minesweeper but bad. You will get free %lowername% moolah from it though!

economy.balance: (`bal`) See your balance or somebody else's.
economy.give: Give someone some of your inventory items.
economy.inventory: (`inv`) See your inventory or someone else's.
economy.item: See some information about an item.
economy.shop: See all the items that exist.

karma.karma: See someone's or your own karma score.
karma.karma_graph: A graph of net karma change each day.

admin.auth: For signing in to the admin web panel.
admin.mute: Force mute and unmute everyone in a specified VC.
admin.ows: Set up the one word story channel.
